Posts.Content: Sep 26, 2017 11:29AM Roisin wrote: Hi Mom of twins...our story appears similar. I am stage 2b grade 3 with 2 positive nodes, ER+ and PR+. I did chemo first - 4 AC and 4 Taxol. Then i had a lumpectomy and got clear margins. Once we seen the pathology report it appeared that the tumor actually only had a tiny response to chemo. The tumor was initially 3.3cm and after chemo it was 3cm but the nodes showed good response. I am on tamoxifen and zodalex and about to start rads. I am so scared this has made my prognosis worse than i imagined. Have you any information or advice from your experience ?
Posts.Title: Response to neoadjuvant chemo? Mom_of_twins beauz
